Name: phosphoric acid production, dihydrate process | fluosilicic acid, without water, in 22% solution state | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2012:Manufacture of fertilizers and nitrogen compounds
Description: Data refers to wet-phosphoric acid production from phosphate rock by the dihydrate process. Technology with cooling ponds and gypsum stacks as used in Florida was applied.  Balanced water management assumed.
